item.description: Contained - Grass Fire; INC#0808; 02:15PM; EB 134 Fwy x Hollywood Fwy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QkiedJ; #StudioCity; 20 Firefighters took a little more than two hours to fully extinguish and thoroughly overhaul stubborn flames in a half-acre of mulch, vegetation and debris at and near the 101/134 Freeway interchange. No structure damage. No injury. Lane closures in the immediate area of the fire have been lifted. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 78; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E278 E86 E89 T78; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Grass Fire; INC#0808; 12:05PM; EB 134 Fwy x Hollywood Fwy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QkiedJ; #StudioCity; PRELIM: Half-acre of mulch, vegetation and debris on fire at and near freeway interchange. No structure threat. No injury. #LATRaffic: One of more lanes of nearby surface streets and freeway lanes may be temporarily closed until LAFD operations are complete. ; FS 78; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E278 E86 E89 T78; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0353; 07:18AM; 4728 S Western Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3BYg2Eg; #VermontSquare; *Address Remains Tentative*. 36 firefighters took just 23 minutes to extinguish an outside fire that threatened but was kept to the exterior of a 50' x 50' one story automotive tire shop. No injury. Fire cause under active investigation.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; AR10 AR7 AR9 BC11 BC13 BC18 E15 E210 E215 E233 E266 E46 E66 RA266 SQ21 T10 T15 T33 T66; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0353; 06:55AM; 4728 S Western Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3BYg2Eg; #VermontSquare; *Address Tentative*. PRELIM: Outside fire has extended to a 50' x 50' one story automotive tire shop.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E15 E210 E215 E46 E66 SQ21 T10 T15; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey

Fatal Traffic Collision; INC#1712; 09:52PM; 1266 E 23rd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3w1tp2O; #CentralAlameda; Solo vehicle vs. (parked?) truck. One person trapped in the vehicle has proven beyond medical help and is dead at the scene. No other injuries. Media Inquiries: LAPD Central Traffic Division (Incident #4502) and Coroner.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 E10 E2 E210 E9 EM1 HR3 RA10 RA14 T10; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0859; 01:18PM; 1445 N Las Palmas Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3BXvBw2; Hollywood; KNOCKDOWN: *Updated Address* 43 firefighters extinguished the fire in 19 minutes with no injuries reported. This structure is a two story, vacant theatre which burned previously. Firefighters defended the adjacent structures from damage. Traffic at the Sunset x Las Palmas intersection will be affect for (estimated) the next 90 mins and drivers are advised to seek alternate routes. ; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC14 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E227 E235 E261 E27 E41 E76 E82 EA1 EM5 RA27 T27 T35 T61; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0859; 12:59PM; 1400 N Las Palmas Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3BWLoLh; Hollywood; Two story, cedar sided residence with heavy fire showing on the Charlie (east) side with at least one additional building exposed on the Delta (south) side (site of previous burn and structure has no roof). Firefighters are in the defensive mode with one additional task force requested. ; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC14 BC5 E227 E261 E27 E41 E82 RA27 T27 T61; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Train vs Ped - FATALITY; INC#0389; 08:17AM; 8221 N San Fernando Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SDBggt; Sun Valley; One patient (age/gender unknown) determined deceased on scene after being struck by train. There are no injuries aboard the train. The train tracks are currently closed, affecting Metro Link riders, while passengers disembark the affected train and the law enforcement investigation is conducted. Riders are recommended to follow https://metrolinktrains.com/train-status/ or on Twitter @metrolink for train status updates. The 9-1-1 call was received at 7:54AM. No further details.; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 E24 E260 E289 E298 E89 EM14 HR3 RA74 RA98 T60 T89 T98 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update FATALITY Structure Fire; INC#0205; 04:28AM; 516 S Clarence St (updated address); MAP: https://bit.ly/3JNmrUO; Boyle Heights; KNOCKDOWN: 44 firefighters extinguished the fire in 21 minutes, preventing it from spreading beyond the unit of origin. While conducting a thorough search of the apartment, firefighters located a victim and determined death on scene. LAFD Arson is responding for the investigation. This will remain an active scene for the duration of the morning and commuters are advised to avoid the area of S Clarence St, south of East 4th St due to the presence of LAFD apparatus. No further details.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC13 BC5 E12 E17 E210 E211 E221 E25 RA2 SQ21 T10 T11 T21 T9; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire; INC#0180; 04:31AM; Nb 110 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3w8WHdN; Elysian Park; Firefighters located a slow moving fire in heavy brush (no wind) estimated at 1/4 acre. Firefighters on the ground deployed hand lines to access and surround the fire while Air Ops conducted water drops. All forward progress stopped and the fire is contained. Crews will continue to conduct mop up operations with the fire held to less than 1/2 acre. No injuries reported. The 9-1-1 call was revived at 3:37AM. No further details. ; FS 4; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AO1 AO2 BC1 BC11 E2 E20 E201 E202 E203 E209 E290 E4 E9 E90 EM1 H1 H3 H5 HA1 HA3 HA5 RA4 T1 T2 T3 T90; CH7; 15; Margaret Stewart
